CustomField.formula: IF(FIND( "utm_campaign", gaURL__c ) = 0, '', MID ( gaURL__c, FIND( "utm_campaign", gaURL__c ) + 13 , IF(FIND ( "&", gaURL__c, FIND( "utm_campaign", gaURL__c ) ) = 0, LEN(gaURL__c) - 13 - FIND( "utm_campaign", gaURL__c ), FIND ( "&", gaURL__c, FIND( "utm_campaign", gaURL__c ) ) - 13 - FIND( "utm_campaign", gaURL__c ) )))
CustomField.label: activeChannel_gaCampaign
